title: Lawrence and Houseworth Collection
description: Information regarding access, copying and use of Lawrence and Houseworth Collection items held by the Library of Congress Prints and Photographs Division
cleaned_text: | | | | Lawrence and Houseworth Collection Rights and Restrictions Information Publication and other forms of distribution: Images in this collection are considered to be in the public domain. Copyright for such works is determined by guidelines on the duration of copyright; see: Access: Subject to P&P policy on serving originals, which requires that digital or hard copy surrogates be used in preference to the original photographs. Reproduction (photocopying, hand-held camera copying, photoduplication and other forms of copying allowed by "fair use"): Subject to P&P policy on copying. This policy prohibits photocopying of original photographs. Credit Line: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Lawrence and Houseworth Collection, [reproduction number, e.g., LC-USZ62-90145] For more information, please read: Prepared by: Prints and Photographs Division staff. Revised: Oct. 2002; March 2019 | | |
